title: Shrtn - your own link shortener
meta_description: Shrtn is your own customizable link shortener. Easily shorten, manage, and track your links with our open-source solution.
meta_keywords: link shortener, URL shortener, open-source, customizable, link management
sign_in_link: Add the links to your account
teaser: A small easy to setup open-source link shortener
email_info: We will send you an e-mail with a key
verification_subline: Please enter the {keyLength} digit key we sent to your e-mail.
error_link_min_lenght: We require links with a min length of {requirement}
error_invalid_url: Please enter a valid URL. We reciefed: {received}
verification_mail_body: Please enter the following key on the page that opens after you have entered your e-mail. This key only works on this website.
